I rebased and regenerated and tried building the vcxprojects.

It currently doesn't build as there are bunch of warnings treated as errors in the new C++ code.
Given that things compile under cmake, is it likely that all of these are fixable if we really needed the vcxprojects back.
Closing this PR for now, feel free to reopen if I should give it a try to make it work.
